vote.title: Authorize (1) acquisition of approximately 76,181 square feet of land; and (2) acquisition of a slope easement of approximately 10,630 square feet of land located near the intersection of University Hills Boulevard and Wheatland Road for the Wheatland Road Extension Project - Not to exceed $209,600.00 ($206,100.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,500.00) - Financing: 2024B Certificates of Obligation Fund
